data.prompt:
Create a vibrant, illustrated scene showing the Tutero AI robot character physically present and helping diverse students with Students doing math activity in a modern classroom setting. MATCH THE REFERENCE IMAGES EXACTLY for the Tutero AI character design.

Aspect ratio 1500:1060 (1500x1060) landscape.

Tutero AI Character (CRITICAL - MUST MATCH REFERENCE IMAGES):
- THE TUTERO AI CHARACTER MUST BE PHYSICALLY PRESENT IN THE SCENE
- Friendly, rounded teal/turquoise robot (#4ECDC4) with expressive features
- Large friendly eyes or animated screen face
- Physically present in the 3D space, NOT on a tablet, screen, or digital device
- Floating/hovering beside, among, or surrounded by the students
- Glowing elements and helpful, encouraging expression
- Actively helping, demonstrating, or teaching the students
- Takes up 20-30% of the frame
- Positioned centrally or near the student group
- MUST look exactly like the Tutero AI character in the reference images
- The robot is a CHARACTER in the scene, interacting with students face-to-face

Students (2-4 students):
- Diverse group: varied ethnicities, genders, appearances
- Age: middle school (12-17 years)
- Expressions: Engaged, enthusiastic, focused, collaborative
- Clothing: Casual contemporary school attire, varied colors
- Body language: Leaning in, gesturing, pointing, actively participating
- Interaction: Discussing with each other AND with the physical Tutero AI robot
- Looking at the AI robot, worksheets, or each other (NOT at tablets/screens)
- Gathered around a shared workspace with the AI robot among them

Setting & Environment:
- Modern classroom or collaborative learning space
- Contemporary desks/tables with students gathered around
- Learning materials: notebooks, textbooks, worksheets, whiteboards, physical manipulatives
- Background: Soft, muted (bookshelves, windows, educational posters - slightly blurred)
- Clean, organized, welcoming space
- NO tablets or digital screens as the primary focus
- NO AI character shown on digital devices
- Physical learning environment with hands-on materials

Learning Activity:
- Students working on Students doing math activity
- Tutero AI robot actively assisting and teaching in person
- Visible materials related to the activity (worksheets, physical manipulatives, whiteboard)
- Mathematical content visible but not overwhelming
- Tools: calculators, rulers, protractors, markers, physical math tools, textbooks
- Clear focus on collaborative problem-solving with the physical AI character's help
- Students interacting directly with the AI robot

Color Palette:
- Tutero AI: Teal/turquoise (#4ECDC4) with glowing cyan/blue accents
- Vibrant, energetic colors: bright blue (#3498DB), warm orange (#E67E22), fresh green (#27AE60)
- Diverse natural skin tones
- Varied colorful clothing for students
- Soft muted background (cream, light gray, soft blue)
- Pops of bright color in learning materials
- Warm, inviting color harmony

Composition:
- Tutero AI robot prominent (20-30% of frame), physically in the scene
- Students in foreground and mid-ground (50-60% of frame)
- Students clustered around shared workspace with AI robot among them or nearby
- Medium shot showing upper bodies, faces, and workspace
- Eye level or slightly above, showing interaction clearly
- Dynamic but balanced layout
- Clear sight lines between students and AI robot

Lighting & Atmosphere:
- Bright, natural, welcoming lighting (classroom lighting)
- Soft shadows creating depth
- Subtle glow from the AI robot character
- Warm, positive, collaborative atmosphere
- Energetic but focused mood
- Professional educational quality

Style Guidelines:
- Illustrated/semi-realistic (not photographic, not cartoon)
- Vibrant and engaging
- Diverse and inclusive representation
- Active learning visible
- Collaborative and supportive atmosphere with AI assistance
- Modern and contemporary
- 3D rendered or high-quality digital illustration

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- The Tutero AI robot MUST be physically present in the scene as a 3D character
- The AI robot is NOT on a screen, tablet, or digital device
- The AI character MUST look exactly like the reference images
- Students are surrounded by or gathered around the physical AI robot
- Must show 2-4 diverse students actively collaborating with the physical AI robot
- Students must be actively working together (not passive)
- Activity (Students doing math activity) must be clearly integrated
- Atmosphere must be positive and engaging
- Professional educational quality
- Inclusive and representative
- The AI robot is a physical character in the scene, helping students directly
- NO digital screens showing the AI - the AI is there in person

Create a 3D rendered illustration showing the Tutero AI robot character helping a student learn about Tutero AI guy playing cricket. MATCH THE REFERENCE IMAGES EXACTLY for the Tutero AI character design.

Aspect ratio 1500:1060 (1500x1060) landscape.

Tutero AI Robot Character (CRITICAL - MUST MATCH REFERENCE IMAGES):
- THE TUTERO AI CHARACTER IS THE STAR OF THIS IMAGE
- Friendly, rounded teal/turquoise robot (#4ECDC4) with expressive features
- Large friendly eyes or animated screen face showing expressions
- Rounded, non-threatening body shape with smooth surfaces
- Glowing elements and helpful, encouraging expression
- Floating/hovering beside or near the student (NOT on a screen or device)
- Physically present in the 3D scene as a character
- Takes up 30-40% of the frame
- MUST look exactly like the Tutero AI character in the reference images

Student Character:
- middle school student (12-17 years old)
- Diverse representation (varied ethnicity, gender)
- Engaged, curious, and learning
- Looking at tablet/laptop or interacting with the AI robot
- Casual contemporary clothing
- Positive, focused expression

Setting & Context:
- Educational environment related to Tutero AI guy playing cricket
- Student using tablet or laptop showing educational content
- AI robot positioned beside/near student, appearing helpful and supportive
- Clean, modern, uncluttered background
- Soft educational atmosphere
- Learning materials subtly visible

Technology Elements:
- Tablet/laptop with clean modern interface
- Soft glowing screen showing Tutero AI guy playing cricket-related content
- Optional: Floating mathematical symbols or diagrams related to Tutero AI guy playing cricket
- Optional: Holographic display elements emanating from AI or device
- Subtle tech particle effects around the AI character
- Technology feels helpful and friendly, not overwhelming

Color Palette:
- Tutero AI Robot: Teal/turquoise (#4ECDC4) with glowing cyan/blue accents
- Accent colors: Soft purple/lavender (#9B59B6), warm coral (#FF6B6B)
- Background: Light cream/off-white (#FFF9F5), soft gradients
- Tech glow: Soft blue (#5DADE2), cyan highlights
- Natural skin tones for student
- Warm, inviting color harmony

Composition:
- Tutero AI robot prominent on left or right (30-40% of frame)
- Student on opposite side, engaged with device or looking at AI
- Clear visual connection/interaction between AI and student
- Balanced, harmonious layout
- Shallow depth of field with focus on characters
- Eye level or slightly above

Lighting & Mood:
- Soft, warm, inviting lighting
- Gentle shadows creating depth
- Subtle glow from AI character and screens
- Encouraging, positive, supportive atmosphere
- Bright, daytime feel
- Professional educational quality

Style Guidelines:
- 3D rendered, modern illustration style (like Pixar/modern animation)
- Friendly, approachable, non-threatening
- Educational and professional
- Technology feels helpful and empowering
- Diverse and inclusive representation
- Polished, high-quality render

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- The Tutero AI robot character MUST be physically present in the scene as a 3D character
- The AI character MUST look exactly like the reference images
- The AI character is the PRIMARY focus and hero of the image
- Student must appear engaged and learning
- Context (Tutero AI guy playing cricket) should be subtly integrated through screen content or floating elements
- Maintain warm, encouraging, supportive atmosphere
- Professional educational quality
- NO generic robots - must be the specific Tutero AI character design
- The robot is NOT on a screen or tablet - it's a physical character in the scene
